attributes.action: changing gsces to o levels and cse is wrong its not fair on the less able students not to be able to try at the same level as the rest
attributes.additional_details: today it has been announced that they are trying to bring back the two tier education system from the 1950s which only gives the able and more fortunate children the opportunity to gain a good qualification and decent job if this goes a head the children will basically be put into groups of capable and incapable which to me is not fair every child deserves a chance
